overview:
Daniel Starr, Chief Acquisitions Officer, SendMe Mobile

Daniel Starr was most recently the Vice President of Marketing for Blockbuster Inc. At Blockbuster Daniel oversaw the company’s online media and marketing activities, including trend assessment, search engine optimization, tracking and analysis. Prior to his engagement with Blockbuster Daniel was the VP of Performance Marketing for Gorilla Nation Media. In 2004 Gorilla Nation acquired WebRoyalties, a company founded by Daniel, after only 8 months of operation. Daniel began his career online at Intermix Media as a Director of Business Development.

Daniel graduated with honors from Drexel University with a BS in Psychology.
